params.timeDelta: Number of seconds over which to calculate the accumulated funding amount.

getFunding(uint256).return: True if the funding rate is positive, and false otherwise.The funding amount as a unitless rate, represented as a fixed-point number                   with 18 decimals.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFundingRate((uint256,bool)).details: Can only be called by the funding rate provider. Emits the LogFundingRateUpdated event.

params.newRate: The intended new funding rate. Is bounded by the global constant bounds.

setFundingRate((uint256,bool)).return: The new funding rate with a timestamp of the update.

params.newProvider: The new provider, who will have the ability to set the funding rate.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getFunding(uint256).notice: Calculates the signed funding amount that has accumulated over a period of time.

setFundingRate((uint256,bool)).notice: Set the funding rate, denoted in units per second, fixed-point with 18 decimals.

setFundingRateProvider(address).notice: Set the funding rate provider. Can only be called by the admin.

userdoc.notice: Oracle providing the funding rate for a perpetual market.
